Name: Trade Subsidy
Desc: New Sophiasburgh Coin +50 when you enter a shop.

Name: Negotiation Skills
Desc: 10% off all items in the shop.

Name: Start from Scratch
Desc: Receive 1 Construction Permit at the start.

Name: Everything You Need
Desc: Receive 2 Construction Permits at the start.

Name: Long-Term Planning
Desc: Refresh Camp Support once for free.

Name: Reverse Reconstruction
Desc: Unlock Sand Table Reconstruction: Teleports the user back to 3 days ago and refunds some of the resources consumed in the period. Can only be used once per chapter. Uses cannot be accumulated. Available 3 days after you enter the current map.

Name: Fitting Recursion
Desc: Gain 100 bonus Silver Coins after sand able reconstruction

Name: Rewinding Hourglass
Desc: Gain 1 bonus Action Point after sand able reconstruction
